markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Treerazer (Lord of the Blasted Tarn)](/Deities.aspx?ID=26)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 312</row>

Treerazer, the Lord of the Blasted Tarn, is a nascent demon lord of pollution and the corruption of nature, believed by many to be an exiled servant or spawn of [Cyth-V’sug](/Deities.aspx?ID=74) who was banished to Golarion after a failed attempt at supplanting the demon lord. Though Treerazer is a nascent demon lord, and thus lacks the power of a true demon lord, he is perhaps most noteworthy among those who have a stake in Golarion due to his physical presence within the Tanglebriar, a corrupted, fetid swamp that was once the southern edges of the elven nation of Kyonin. He is served by devoted cultists in and around Kyonin, though small pockets of believers can be found around Golarion working furtively to free him in hopes of gaining his favor upon his ascension. Treerazer’s religious symbol is a bleeding dead tree that’s been split in half.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** corrupt plant life with evil or fungal influences, slay elves, feast on rotten flesh or fungus

**Anathema** grant mercy to elves, plant trees, encourage natural plant growth

**Area of Concern**
pollution and the corruption of nature

**Follower Alignments**
NE, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [Battle Axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=8), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=23), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=33)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141)

- **3rd**
[Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=366)

- **6th**
[Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=331)

</column>
name: Treerazer (Lord of the Blasted Tarn)
